review: ********* ***********Doctor tools time to check the patient.. She explained the situation well.. My daughter recovered within 2 days

We went for stomach ache & constipation for our 3.5 yrs kid. I liked the Dr very much. She was professional, did a thorough check and suggested proper care. She listened to us and was very friendly. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Need to be more humble and friendly. Need to give respect to the patient who is talking to you. Need to listen to the patient and be more informative. Moreover as a Pediatrician. Checking the next file while the previous patient not yet left is really unprofessional. Totally disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: For a paediatrician she was unfriendly. No proper answers to all our questions related to the baby's diet, stomach issue, fever etc. Offered no solution to any of the problems. Was in a hurry to finish off the patient  que. Not worth the time and money spent. Didn't even suggest what to do in case of emergency. Would not recommend her at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Meera Iyer is my go to doctor for both of my children. She is always patient and will calm parents anxiety about the illness with clear explanation, she is not the one who will panic you and make you admit your child. She prescribes antibiotics only when it is absolutely needed. It is very rare to see doctor like her these days. I highly recommend Dr. Meera Iyer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Have been consulting her since my son was born she never prescribe antibiotics unnecessarily really nice doctor friendly nd diagnoses quickly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Price was too much high if it is less then 300 that's better for everyone...extended atlist 2 weeks.
